dcterms:creator: E. B. Hodcroft
dcterms:description: The CoVariants dataset provides the current state of variants and mutations of interest for SARS-CoV-2, with data ranging from August 2020 through October 2023, and includes bi-weekly resolution for 36 variants.
dcterms:title: CoVariants

dcterms:creator: T. Hale
N. Angrist
R. Goldszmidt
B. Kira
A. Petherick
T. Phillips
S. Webster
E. Cameron-Blake
L. Hallas
S. Majumdar
dcterms:description: The OxCGRT dataset provides details on the level of border controls enacted by governments in real-time from January 1, 2020, to January 8, 2023, measuring variations in government responses using a COVID-19 Government Response Stringency Index.
dcterms:title: OxCGRT

dcterms:creator: P1sec
dcterms:description: The Country adjacency dataset provides a list of countries and their neighboring countries, which is useful for understanding geographical relationships.
dcterms:title: Country adjacency dataset

dcterms:creator: OpenFlights
dcterms:description: The OpenFlights dataset is a collection of regular flights along with their routes mapped from airports around the world, providing information about airports, train stations, and ferry terminals.
dcterms:title: OpenFlights
